name: RSS News Scroller
author: Pierpaolo Romanelli

sections.description:
RSS News Scroller is a simple news scroller which you can use by just activating it. Classic jQuery scrolling effect attract user to read news from Feed.

  • News Scroller with RSS
  • Fade Effect
  • Scrolling Effects settings
  • Widget
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin by going to the RSS News menu that appears in your admin menu
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with contact me on
RSS News
